        protected final void changeStatus​(Task.Status status)

        另请参阅:
        changeStatus(Status, Exception)

      • changeStatus

        protected final void changeStatus​(Task.Status status,
                                  java.lang.Exception exception)
        Change the status of the task to the given status, this will automatically send an event
        参数:
        status - the target status
        exception - why status change
